--- select_count_asterisk.sql
select count(*) from singers

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:        0,
    AllOrDistinct: "",
    As:            nil,
    Results:       []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.CountStarExpr{
          Count:  7,
          Rparen: 14,
        },
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   16,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 21,
          NameEnd: 28,
          Name:    "singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM singers
